message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. I'm not at liberty to disclose the specifics just yet, but I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a chance to acquire something truly special, and I believe it will be a valuable asset for you. Please let me know if you're interested.
